name: The Future of Education International Conference
content: All accepted papers will be presented on-site and on-line. Interactive Questions and Answers sessions will follow each paper presentation. Poster Presentation Sessions will also be held, on-site and on-line. Networking Opportunities will be organized. Important Dates: 2 May 2022: Extended deadline for submitting abstracts 23 May 2022: Notification of acceptance / rejection of abstracts 6 May 2022: Deadline for final submission of papers (extendible) 30 June â€“ 1 July 2022: Conference days All accepted papers will be included in the Conference Proceedings published by Filodiritto Editore with ISBN, ISSN and DOI codes. The publication will be sent to be reviewed for inclusion in the Conference Proceedings Citation Index by ISI-Clarivate- Web of Science. The publication will also be included in Academia and indexed in Google Scholar
